name: Defenders of Asteria
description:
DEFEND THE KINGDOM

The time has come to defend your lands from the hordes of invading forces. Build up your defenses and summon mighty heroes to aid you as you become one of the Defenders of Asteria!

DIFFERENT WAYS TO PLAY

Put your strategic mind to the test and take on 10 different levels while trying to master them! When you think you finally have it down, try your hand at endless mode where all the enemies are generated at random. All of the towers matter in this back to basics tower defense game.

FACE THE DRAGON'S WRATH

The dragon Seran has taken notice of you wiping out his armies, and now hes out for revenge! In this special Raid mode you will take on a challenging 100 waves of enemies with no access to the Refinery tower to increase income. Enemies may also be a bit stronger and scale more, so be sure to stock up on perks and rev up that brain power before trying your hand to stop him.

KEY FEATURES

  • Enlist 5 different heroes to help you cull the hordes on the battlefield
  • 10 current maps to conquer
  • Endless mode for endless fun
  • A difficult Raid map to test your skills
  • Unlock perks through playing to enhance your strength
